verses.kjv: I saw the LORD standing upon the altar: and he said, Smite the lintel of the door, that the posts may shake: and cut them in the head, all of them; and I will slay the last of them with the sword: he that fleeth of them shall not flee away, and he that escapeth of them shall not be delivered.
verses.ct: I saw the Lord standing beside the altar, and he said, 'Strike the tops of the pillars so that the thresholds shake. Bring them crashing down on everyone's head. Those who survive, I will kill with the sword. Not one of them will escape. Not one who runs will get away.'

verses.kjv: Though they dig into hell, thence shall mine hand take them; though they climb up to heaven, thence will I bring them down:
verses.ct: Even if they dig down to the depths of the grave, my hand will pull them out. Even if they climb up to heaven, I will drag them back down.

verses.kjv: And though they hide themselves in the top of Carmel, I will search and take them out thence; and though they be hid from my sight in the bottom of the sea, thence will I command the serpent, and he shall bite them:
verses.ct: Even if they hide on the peak of Carmel, I will hunt them down and seize them. Even if they conceal themselves from me at the bottom of the sea, I will command the serpent there, and it will bite them.

verses.kjv: And though they go into captivity before their enemies, thence will I command the sword, and it shall slay them: and I will set mine eyes upon them for evil, and not for good.
verses.ct: Even if their enemies take them away as captives, I will command the sword there, and it will kill them. I will fix my gaze on them — not to help them, but to harm them.

verses.kjv: And the Lord GOD of hosts is he that toucheth the land, and it shall melt, and all that dwell therein shall mourn: and it shall rise up wholly like a flood; and shall be drowned, as by the flood of Egypt.
verses.ct: The Lord GOD of Armies touches the land and it melts, and everyone living in it mourns. The whole land rises like the Nile River and sinks back down again, like the flooding of Egypt's river.

verses.kjv: It is he that buildeth his stories in the heaven, and hath founded his troop in the earth; he that calleth for the waters of the sea, and poureth them out upon the face of the earth: The LORD is his name.
verses.ct: He is the one who builds his upper chambers in heaven and sets their foundation on the earth. He summons the waters of the sea and pours them out over the surface of the earth. The LORD is his name.

verses.kjv: Are ye not as children of the Ethiopians unto me, O children of Israel? saith the LORD. Have not I brought up Israel out of the land of Egypt? and the Philistines from Caphtor, and the Syrians from Kir?
verses.ct: "People of Israel, aren't you just like the Ethiopians to me?" declares the LORD. "Didn't I bring Israel up from the land of Egypt? And the Philistines from Caphtor? And the Syrians from Kir?"

verses.kjv: Behold, the eyes of the Lord GOD are upon the sinful kingdom, and I will destroy it from off the face of the earth; saving that I will not utterly destroy the house of Jacob, saith the LORD.
verses.ct: Pay attention — the eyes of the Lord GOD are on this sinful kingdom, and I will wipe it off the surface of the earth. Yet I will not completely destroy the house of Jacob," declares the LORD.

verses.kjv: For, lo, I will command, and I will sift the house of Israel among all nations, like as corn is sifted in a sieve, yet shall not the least grain fall upon the earth.
verses.ct: "Look, I am going to give the command, and I will shake the house of Israel among all the nations, the way grain is shaken in a sieve — yet not a single kernel will fall to the ground.

verses.kjv: All the sinners of my people shall die by the sword, which say, The evil shall not overtake nor prevent us.
verses.ct: All the sinners among my people will die by the sword — the ones who say, 'Disaster will never catch up with us or come near us.'

verses.kjv: In that day will I raise up the tabernacle of David that is fallen, and close up the breaches thereof; and I will raise up his ruins, and I will build it as in the days of old:
verses.ct: "On that day I will restore David's fallen shelter. I will repair its broken walls, rebuild its ruins, and reconstruct it the way it was in ancient times,

verses.kjv: That they may possess the remnant of Edom, and of all the heathen, which are called by my name, saith the LORD that doeth this.
verses.ct: so that they may take possession of what remains of Edom and of all the nations that bear my name," declares the LORD, who will accomplish this.

verses.kjv: Behold, the days come, saith the LORD, that the plowman shall overtake the reaper, and the treader of grapes him that soweth seed; and the mountains shall drop sweet wine, and all the hills shall melt.
verses.ct: "The days are coming," declares the LORD, "when the one who plows will catch up to the one who harvests, and the one who crushes grapes will catch up to the one who plants seed. Sweet wine will drip from the mountains, and all the hills will flow with it.

verses.kjv: And I will bring again the captivity of my people of Israel, and they shall build the waste cities, and inhabit them; and they shall plant vineyards, and drink the wine thereof; they shall also make gardens, and eat the fruit of them.
verses.ct: I will restore the fortunes of my people Israel. They will rebuild the ruined cities and live in them. They will plant vineyards and drink their wine. They will cultivate gardens and eat their produce.

verses.kjv: And I will plant them upon their land, and they shall no more be pulled up out of their land which I have given them, saith the LORD thy God.
verses.ct: I will firmly plant them in their own land, and they will never again be uprooted from the land I have given them," says the LORD your God.
